bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I like sweet flowers. What am I?
I hop around and have long legs. I love to eat plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I'm not a frog, but I jump!

bug.question: I am a small bug that lights up the night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 You can see me at night

bug.question: I have six legs and live in a colony. I carry food back to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am strong for my size

bug.question: I start as a worm-like larva and turn into something beautiful with wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat a lot as a baby

bug.question: I'm red with black spots, and said to bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have spots on my back

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. I have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕷️ I have more legs than a human

bug.question: I can be green or brown and blend in with leaves. I look like a twig. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I look like a part of a tree
🍃 My disguise helps me avoid being eaten

bug.question: I am a master of disguise, blending in with flowers to catch my prey. What am I?

hints.text: 🙏 I have a religious sounding name.

bug.question: I have pincers on my rear and can give a painful pinch, but I am not a crab. What am I?

hints.text: 👂 My name is associated with a part of the head
🤏 I use my pincers for defense.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and bright colors, but I don't have legs to run. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 People often give me as a gift.

plant.question: I am tall and green, and birds build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 You can make paper from me.
🍁 I lose my leaves in the fall.

plant.question: I am long and orange and grow underground. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 👓 You can improve your eyesight by eating me.

plant.question: I am a prickly plant that lives in the desert. What am I?

hints.text: 🏜️ I can survive in very hot and dry places.
⚠️ Be careful of my sharp needles!

plant.question: I am a small green plant that covers the ground, often in parks and lawns. What am I?

hints.text: ✂️ I need to be cut regularly to stay neat.

plant.question: I'm a seed that grows into a tall plant with golden kernels. You can pop me for a tasty treat. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I am often eaten at the movies.

plant.question: I'm a type of plant that climbs and has sweet, juicy fruits. What am I?

hints.text: 🍷 Juice and wine are made from me.
☀️ I like warm and sunny weather.

plant.question: I'm a plant with a strong scent. My leaves are often used to flavor pizza and pasta sauce. What am I?

hints.text: 🇮🇹 I am often used in Italian cooking.
🍕 My name sounds like a boy's name.

plant.question: I am a plant that lives in water and has large, floating leaves. Frogs like to sit on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I am often found in ponds.
🍃 My leaves are very big and flat.

plant.question: I'm a very large flower that smells like rotting meat! What am I?

hints.text: 💀 I am one of the largest flowers in the world.
🪰 My smell attracts flies to pollinate me.
🇮🇩 I am found in the rainforests of Indonesia.
